name: GitHub requires cookies
title: JAGEX [bad] Jagex may transfer the agreement and your information to another party at any time

tosdr.tldr: GitHub requires cookies to work and misleads you to believe that you remain anonymous while cookies contain “unique identifiers”. However, only session cookies are used, not persistent cookies.
